name: Suddenly, the King of France!
description:
You are the King of France and must stop the revolutionaries from tossing you to the guillotine! What better way to do this than to blast them with your extra regal garments and turn them on each other?

Shoot the charging revolutionaries with all three accoutrements and they will get tossed on the guillotine to score you points.

Earn big combos and try for a high score!

Created as part of WizardJam 5, based on Idle Thumbs Episode 241: "Suddenly the King of France"

You can read the sporadically updated development log for the game on the Idle Thumbs forums if you wish!

The Mac and Linux builds have not been tested at all. The PC build got the most attention, but as this was a jam game, there are bound to be bugs. Let me know when you find some and I will try to update the game.

**Big update on 7/1/2017 - check the devlog for details!

**Update on 7/8 - fixed an end-game bug and added a fade-in and tip to the start of the game since I had it open anyway. 

(Linux currently unavailable. Sorry about that.)
